Container.Name: sentry-six
Container.Overview:
Sentry-Six is a Tesla Dashcam Viewer application that allows you to browse, view, and export Tesla Sentry Mode and Dashcam footage.
Access the WebUI at http://[IP]:5800
Features: - Browse Tesla footage by date and event type - Multi-camera synchronized playback - Export clips with custom layouts - Automatic event detection

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for the web-based UI (noVNC). Access at http://[IP]:5800

Config.Name: VNC Port
Config.Description: Port for direct VNC client access (optional)

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to store application settings and configuration. Contains settings.json and machine ID for persistent fingerprint.

Config.Name: Tesla Footage Path
Config.Description: Path to your Tesla footage folder (TeslaCam). This is where your Sentry Mode and Dashcam recordings are stored.

Config.Name: Display Width
Config.Description: Width of the application window in pixels

Config.Name: Display Height
Config.Description: Height of the application window in pixels

Config.Name: Dark Mode
Config.Description: Enable dark mode for the WebUI (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

Config.Name: Keep App Running
Config.Description: Automatically restart the application if it crashes (1=enabled)

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for the container (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London)

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (default: 99 for nobody)

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (default: 100 for users)
